frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-shutdowntimer
frozen.shortDescription: Shutdown/reboot/suspend the device after a specific time or wake with a rtc alarm.
frozen.longDescription:
Shutdown/reboot/suspend the device after a specific time or wake with a rtc alarm.

The screen saver will not interrupt the timer. A privileged control script may be installed to control shutdown and rtcwake as user. Additionally, a check command may be configured before shutdown.
